content.raw:
I can confirm that this is really issue :wink: … I am looking at logs from Simple Cave 1 from CloudSim and all I have is 110MB of

```
77.716000000 ERROR /A60F300L/ros_ign_image_depth [/tmp/binarydeb/ros-melodic-compressed-image-transport-1.9.5/src/compressed_publisher.cpp:150(CompressedPublisher::publish)] [topics: /rosout, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_updates] Compressed Image Transport - JPEG compression requires 8/16-bit color format (input format is: 32FC1)
77.720000000 ERROR /A60F300L/ros_ign_image_depth [/tmp/binarydeb/ros-melodic-theora-image-transport-1.9.5/src/theora_publisher.cpp:173(TheoraPublisher::publish)] [topics: /rosout, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_updates] cv_bridge exception: '[32FC1] is not a color format. but [bgr8] is. The conversion does not make sense'
...
3728.216000000 ERROR /A60F300L/ros_ign_image_depth [/tmp/binarydeb/ros-melodic-compressed-image-transport-1.9.5/src/compressed_publisher.cpp:150(CompressedPublisher::publish)] [topics: /rosout, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_updates] Compressed Image Transport - JPEG compression requires 8/16-bit color format (input format is: 32FC1)
3728.216000000 ERROR /A60F300L/ros_ign_image_depth [/tmp/binarydeb/ros-melodic-theora-image-transport-1.9.5/src/theora_publisher.cpp:173(TheoraPublisher::publish)] [topics: /rosout, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressedDepth/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/compressed/parameter_updates, /A60F300L/front/depth, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_descriptions, /A60F300L/front/depth/theora/parameter_updates] cv_bridge exception: '[32FC1] is not a color format. but [bgr8] is. The conversion does not make sense' 
```

\(Release 2020-03-23\)
